item.title: Model and Project the death toll of coronavirus at Wuhan Province in R
item.description: require(tidyverse) require(modelr) require(magrittr) require(gam) require(sf) Introduction This tutorial will show you how to scrape that data from html table, which lives in a wikipedia and download the data for further processing. Let us load the packages we need for the session Figure 1: The map showing the spread of coronavirus Data The data for this analysis was obtained from the Wikipedia page that provide updates of people died with coronavirus in Wuhan province.
